boardgame.name: Feudum
boardgame.description: Blimey! You and your blokes have been banished and stripped of everything but a few shillings and table scraps. Undaunted, you journey to a strange land to reinvent yourself and reclaim your honor. Will you farm the earth, fight as knights or finagle your own feudums?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Feudum (latin for fiefdom) is an economic medieval game of hand and resource management for 2-5 players. With many strategies at their disposal, players optimize four actions per turn in attempt to score the most victory points over five epochs._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player controls several medieval characters that roam the countryside tending farms, taxing towns and taking outposts in effort to rise in power._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;But that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s only the tip of the behemoth's horn! You will also compete to acquire coveted feudums, which increase your membership status in one of six guilds. But beware! Feudum owners must pay homage to the king through military service or face the charge of disloyalty._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Once a guild member, you will dutifully play your part in a progressive economic cycle, whereby the farmer ships goods to the merchant who equips the alchemist, who invents black powder, which arms the knight, and so on._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;If you run your guilds wisely, maintain control of key locations and adapt best to changing events, you will be victorious. Unless, of course, you starve, get sidetracked by sea serpents or develop an unhealthy interest in fermented grapes. Long live the King!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: PRE-ORDER: Expected Delivery Q4 2017 This is a pre-order for the Kickstarter version of Feudum Big Box, all applicable stretch goals included.

I need the money more than I need the game - up for sale is my pre-shipped Kickstarter pledge at the Feudum Friend level ($99 + 18.30). I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve set the price only slightly higher than you would have paid at the time of the campaign. I have every expectation that the game will be both amazing and beautiful, but rent_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s gone up and that takes priority. Shipping has already been paid, and as such I can only ship domestically. I prefer payment methods that do not charge a fee to the buyer or seller, such as Venmo or Amazon.com gift card. PayPal offers a feeless payment system (Send Money to Friends - you can be the judge on whether applying this system to a BGG purchase is OK in your book), but if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to use Paypal Pay For Goods I would ask you to cover their fee. FEUDUM FRIEND - This limited-edition of Feudum is stamped in Foil and also upgrades 29 game pieces into wooden King Seals, Rosary Beads _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Archery Targets.

*** PREORDER WITH EXPECTED DELIVERY Q1 2018*** Contents: Kickstarter Feudum Board Game _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;All In One Big Box_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Bundle. Includes Core Game, Alter Ego, Windmills _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Catapults, Seals _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Sirens Expansions (note: all expansions come in the single Foil Core Game Box), 50 Custom Metal Coins, Deluxe King Seals, Rosary Beads _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Archery, Targets, Flying Epoch Marker plus Squirrels _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Conifers Stretch Goal Expansion, as well as all other stretch goals fitting neatly in One Big Box. Please note: unless otherwise stated paid add ons from the Kickstarter Campaign are not included.

This is the Feudum Big Box, including metal coins, deluxe wooden pieces and Meeple Realty wooden insert. I opened the plastic foil from the box and the wooden insert, but I realized soon that I had no friends who enjoy playing this. Nothing got punched out and the plastic foil is still over the cards. This item is posted as a part of the WargameHQ Shelf Clearing Auction. The item listed is only for purchase by: fefecat The price has been set at the winning bid, or Buy It Now, price posted to the auction item comment page. If you won multiple items, please be sure to add them all to your cart at once and then check out so I can include them in your shipping estimate. As a reminder: I will only ship to the addresses within the United States. I only accept PayPal and payment details will be sent alongside your final invoice. Your item(s) will ship on the Saturday FOLLOWING verified payment. I will provide tracking information for your item and insurance sufficient to cover the final price of the auction on shipped items. Please inspect your items within the first 5 business days of receipt, beyond that I cannot assist with disputes. I also make no guarantees implied or otherwise as to the condition of games if the carrier has been rough with shipping. I pack games in peanuts and try to ensure both the games and their contents are secured inside the boxes to minimize issues. If you fail to pay for your item within 5 business days, I will cancel the sale and list the item on eBay and you can re-bid on it there at that time. If you have any special requests, please Geekmail me so we can discuss prior to payment finalization. Thank you for your purchase and I hope you enjoy your new game(s)!
